quackingllama 0.0.0.9014

Retrieve

ql_get_db_options.Rd

Retrieve

Usage

ql_get_db_options(options = c("db", "db_type", "db_folder", "db_filename"))

Arguments

options

Available options that

Value

A list with the selected options.

Examples

ql_get_db_options()
#> $db
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> $db_type
#> [1] "DuckDB"
#> 
#> $db_folder
#> .
#> 
#> $db_filename
#> [1] ""
#> 

## Retrieve only selected option
ql_get_db_options("db_type")
#> $db_type
#> [1] "DuckDB"
#>
